name: MoonBun
description:
A small platformer game written in Unity.

It's about a bunny trying to reach the Moon! It's a simple game, with a little visual flare that you just have to find out as you play.

Comment your highscores!

Controls
  • Spacebar/Enter: Start/Resume/Restart game on the menus
  • Escape: Pause game
  • Spacebar/W: Jump!
Developer Score

Current developer best: 258
